name: Stickman Sword Fight
description:
Dash across the galaxy with your knight carrying a lightsaber, immerse yourself in the adventure and defeat the enemy forces to get the power crystals that give different colors to your laser sword.

How to play:
* Attack your enemies with your sword
* When you shoot enemies with laser you can return the shot by using your lightsaber
* In some levels you accompanying a pet, do not let back and do not let it go away

Features:
* Single game created entirely with pivot / stick
* Style star wars
* Fully touch
* Easy and fun to play.
* Stickman the jedi style


It's always a pleasure to hear from you!
